subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{zh-l|釒/钅}} (when used as a left Chinese radical)

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|王|呂|亼|no_och3=-|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=s|c3=p|t1=upside-down axe|t2=two blocks of metal}}. {{lang|zh|亼}} is the ancient form for {{och-l|今}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Probably from {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*gǝ̆m||metal}}. Compare {{cog|ctd|xam||gold}} and {{cog|lep|tr=kóm|t=silver, coin, money}} ([http://starling.rinet.ru/cgi-bin/response.cgi?root=config&morpho=0&basename=%5Cdata%5Csintib%5Cstibet&first=1&off=&text_proto=*g%C7%9D%CC%86m&method_proto=substring&ic_proto=on&text_meaning=&method_meaning=substring&ic_meaning=on&text_chin=&method_chin=substring&ic_chin=on&text_tib=&method_tib=substring&ic_tib=on&text_burm=&method_burm=substring&ic_burm=on&text_kach=&method_kach=substring&ic_kach=on&text_lush=&method_lush=substring&ic_lush=on&text_lepcha=&method_lepcha=substring&ic_lepcha=on&text_kir=&method_kir=substring&ic_kir=on&text_comments=&method_comments=substring&ic_comments=on&text_any=&method_any=substring&sort=proto&ic_any=on Starling Database]).

“Copper” {{defdate|prior to 5th {{BCE}}}} > “metals in general” > “gold”.

The main senses now are “gold” and “metal”.

subSections.title: Descendants
Kanji
Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かな}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=かな}}. Appears to be the older form of this word. In modern Japanese, only found at the start of compounds.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|金%山|かな%やま}}: a [[mine]] (for mineral extraction)
* {{ja-r|金%床|かな%とこ}}, {{ja-r|鉄%床|かな%とこ}}, {{ja-r|鉄%砧|かな%とこ}}: an [[anvil]]
* {{ja-r|金%具|かな%ぐ}}: [[hardware]], [[metal]] [[fittings]]
* {{ja-r|金%串|かな%ぐし}}: a [[metal]] [[skewer#Noun|skewer]] or [[spit#Noun|spit]]
* {{ja-r|金%轡|かな%ぐつわ}}: a [[metal]] [[bit]] (as for a horse's mouth); [[hush]] money, a [[bribe]]
* {{ja-r|金%槌|かな%づち}}: a [[metal]] [[hammer]]
* {{ja-r|鉄%棒|かな%ぼう}}: a [[metal]] [[rod]] or [[staff]]
* {{ja-r|金%網|かな%あみ}}: a [[metal]] [[mesh]], [[net]], or [[screen]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{lang|ja|金}} spelling is the most common for this term.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|銅|あかがね}}: [[copper]]
* {{ja-r|鋇|あつがね}}: [[barium]]
* {{ja-r|鉱|あらがね}}: [[ore]], [[unrefined]] [[metal]]
* {{ja-r|鉄|くろがね}}: [[iron]]
* {{ja-r|銀|しろがね}}: [[silver]]
* {{ja-r|鑽|たがね}}: [[chisel]]
* {{ja-r|鋼|はがね}}, {{ja-r|鑌|はがね}}: [[steel]]
* {{ja-r|水%銀|みず%がね}}, {{ja-r|汞|みずがね}}: [[mercury]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くがね}}

Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=くがね|黄|tr1=ku|t1=yellow|金|tr2=kane|t2=metal}}. The ''ku'' is a variation of regular {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|''kun'yomi''}} of ''ki'' for the {{ja-l|黄}} character.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> {{rendaku2|sort=くがね|kane|gane}}

subSections.title: Etymology 4
Noun
See also
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|小%金|こ%がね}}: a small amount of [[money]]
* {{ja-r|金%泥|こん%でい}}: “golden mud”, gold dust suspended in an [[emulsion]] and used for painting or other decoration

subSections.title: Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|きん}}

From {{der|ja|sort=きん|ltc|金|tr=kim}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|金|tr=jīn}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|金%魚|きん%ぎょ}}: a [[goldfish]]
* {{ja-r|金%魚%草|きん%ぎょ%そう}}: a [[snapdragon]]
* {{ja-r|金%魚%掬い|きん%ぎょす%くい}}: goldfish [[scooping]] (a fairground game)
* {{ja-r|金%属|きん%ぞく}}: a [[metal]], [[metallic]]
* {{ja-r|金%帛|きん%ぱく}}: [[gold]] and [[silk]], [[money]] and [[cloths]]
* {{ja-r|半%金%属|はん%きん%ぞく}}: [[metalloid]]
* {{ja-r|非%金%属|ひ%きん%ぞく}}: a [[nonmetal]], [[nonmetallic]]
* {{ja-r|金%管 楽%器|きん%かん がっ%き}}: a [[brass instrument]]
* {{ja-r|金%塊|きん%かい}}: a gold [[nugget]], [[bar]], [[ingot]], or [[bullion]]
* {{ja-r|金%型|かね%がた}}: a [[die]] or [[mold]]
* {{ja-r|金%曜%日|きん%よう%び}}: [[Friday]]
* {{ja-r|金%字%塔|きん%じ%とう}}: a [[pyramid]] or [[monument]]
* {{ja-r|金%銭|きん%せん}}: [[money]], [[cash]]
* {{ja-r|金%額|きん%がく}}: an [[amount]] of money
* {{ja-r|金%髪|きん%ぱつ}}: [[blond]] [[hair]]
* {{ja-r|上%金|あげ%がね}}: [[tribute]] paid by general [[commoner]]s to [[daimyō]] in [[feudal]] Japan
* {{ja-r|一%刻 千%金|いっ%こく せん%きん}}: [[time flies when you're having fun]]
* {{ja-r|益%金|えき%きん}}: [[profit]], [[proceeds]]
* {{ja-r|換%金|かん%きん}}: [[realization]] or [[conversion]] of goods into money, such as to [[cash]] a [[check]]
* {{ja-r|金%融|きん%ゆう}}: [[finance]]
* {{ja-r|消%費%者 金%融|しょう%ひ%しゃ きん%ゆう}}: [[consumer finance]]
* {{ja-r|現%金|げん%きん}}: [[cash]]
* {{ja-r|国%庫%金|こっ%こ%きん}}: [[treasury]] [[funds]] {{qualifier|as of the central government}}
* {{ja-r|合%金|ごう%きん}}: an [[alloy]]
* {{ja-r|砂%金|さ%きん}}: [[gold dust]]
* {{ja-r|資%金|し%きん}}: [[capital]], [[funds]]
* {{ja-r|資%金 洗%浄|し%きん せん%じょう}}: [[money laundering]]
* {{ja-r|資%本%金|し%ほん%きん}}: [[capital]], capital [[stock]]
* {{ja-r|借%入%金|しゃく%にゅう%きん}}: [[borrowed]] [[money]], [[debt]] [[payable]], [[loan]] payable
* {{ja-r|賞%金|しょう%きん}}: [[prize]] [[money]], a [[reward]]
* {{ja-r|上%金|じょう%きん}}: [[high]]-[[quality]] or high-[[purity]] [[gold]]
* {{ja-r|代%金|だい%きん}}: a [[rate]], a [[price]]
* {{ja-r|賃%金|ちん%ぎん}}: [[wage]]s
* {{ja-r|年%金|ねん%きん}}: a [[pension]], an [[annuity]]
* {{ja-r|白%金|はっ%きん}}: [[platinum]]
* {{ja-r|引%当%金|ひき%あて%きん}}: [[provision]], [[reserve]]s
* {{ja-r|預%金|よ%きん}}: a [[deposit]] {{qualifier|as in a bank account}}
* {{ja-r|料%金|りょう%きん}}: a [[fee]]
* {{ja-r|錬%金%術|れん%きん%じゅつ}}: [[alchemy]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|こん}}

# one of the [[five]] [[classical]] [[elements]] in traditional Chinese [[philosophy]] and [[medicine]]: see the [[w:Wu Xing|"Wu Xing" entry on Wikipedia]]
